text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/92e5df804719d2e6cb8145c2b098aa8d6f3dd252|patch 8.2.2428: FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty>
patch 8.2.2428: FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty

Problem:    FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty.
Solution:   Don't use the short mouse code if there is a longer matching code.
            (closes #7755)  Add a test.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2428: FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty · vim/vim@92e5df8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2428: FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty · vim/vim@92e5df8
attachments.text: Problem: FocusGained does not work when 'ttymouse' is empty. Solution: Don't use the short mouse code if there is a longer matching code. (closes #7755) Add a test.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3eb6bd9c2b36dcce471bfb543c8d5488f1dc17a4|patch 8.2.2427: can still switch windows for 'completefunc'>
patch 8.2.2427: can still switch windows for 'completefunc'

Problem:    Can still switch windows for 'completefunc'.
Solution:   Also disallow switching windows for other completions.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2427: can still switch windows for 'completefunc' · vim/vim@3eb6bd9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2427: can still switch windows for 'completefunc' · vim/vim@3eb6bd9
attachments.text: Problem: Can still switch windows for 'completefunc'. Solution: Also disallow switching windows for other completions.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/28976e2accf11591c60e8a658a9e03544f0408b2|patch 8.2.2426: allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble>
patch 8.2.2426: allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble

Problem:    Allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble.
Solution:   use "textwinlock" instead of "textlock".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2426: allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble · vim/vim@28976e2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2426: allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble · vim/vim@28976e2
attachments.text: Problem: Allowing 'completefunc' to switch windows causes trouble. Solution: use "textwinlock" instead of "textlock".
